Summary: seen a white light hovering over airspace towards the west towards national guard.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son looked outside and observed a bright white light towards the west of where we live. We figured it was a plane but then the light never moved. It was stationary for 10 mins, then got bright and blinked out. Then a few minutes it reappeared and was gone within a matter of minutes. We have waited for it to reappear and it hasn't. We we're excited and nervous and most of all curious to know what we had seen in the night sky.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around June 4th 2013
